Invocations during Ruki' (bowing in pray.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (How perfect my Lord is, The Supreme.’(three times))

Invocations during Ruki' (bowing in pray.ARABIC_TEXT: سُبْحَانَكَ اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّنَا وَبِحَمْدِكَ، اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي
Invocations during Ruki' (bowing in pray.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (How perfect You are O Allah, our Lord and I praise You.  O Allah, forgive me.)
(Perfect and Holy (He is), Lord of the angles and the Rooh (i.e. Jibra-eel).)

Invocations during Ruki' (bowing in pray.ARABIC_TEXT: لَّهُمَّ لَكَ رَكَعْتُ، وَبِكَ آمَنْتُ، وَلَكَ أَسْلَمْتُ، خَشَعَ لَكَ سَمْعِي، وَبَصَرِي، وَمُخِّي، وَعَــــظْمِي، وَعَصَبِي، [وَمَا استَقَلَّتْ بِهِ قَدَمِي].
Invocations during Ruki' (bowing in pray.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (Allahumma laka rakaAAt, wabika amant, walaka aslamt, khashaAAa laka samAAee, wabasaree, wamukhkhee, waAAathmee, waAAasabee, wamas-taqalla bihi qadamee.)
Invocations during Ruki' (bowing in pray.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (O Allah, unto You I have bowed, and in You I have believed, and to You I have submitted. My hearing, sight, mind, bones, tendons and what my feet carry are humbled before You.)

Invocations during Ruki' (bowing in pray.ARABIC_TEXT: سُبْحَانَ ذِي الْجَبَرُوتِ، وَالْمَلَكُوتِ، وَالْكِبْرِيَاءِ، وَالْعَظَمَةِ.
Invocations during Ruki' (bowing in pray.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (How perfect He is, The Possessor of total power, sovereignty, magnificence and grandeur.)
